title: Ping increases around the same time everyday. Help!
body: Hello, I am from NA servers and I usually play League of Legends on about 50-70 ping which is fantastic. But the past week or so at around 5:30 PM my ping has increased to about 150 and stays there until about 2:00 AM. I have reset my router countless times, uninstalled the client and reinstalled with no change. It doesn't even change the speed of anything else on my computer but LoL. Please Help.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: That high ping might be due to high internet traffic around those times since other people in your immediate area can affect your own internet speeds. We can still take some steps to see if we can bump up that connection a bit and smooth our your ping. Look over some of the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you'll be on your way to a lower ping.
